00021 template <typename Value>
00022 class TObjectProperty: public CPropertyBase
00023 {
00024 public:
00025        typedef Value ValueType;
00026        typedef TObjectProperty<Value> PropertyType;
00027        typedef CPropertyBase BaseClass;
00028 
00029        TObjectProperty();
00030 
00031        TObjectProperty(
00032                             IPropertiesManager* propertyOwnerPtr,
00033                             const QByteArray& propertyName,
00034                             const QByteArray& propertyDescription,
00035                             int propertyFlags,
00036                             int changeFlags = 0,
00037                             const ValueType& defaultValue = ValueType());
00038 
00039        const Value& GetValue() const;
00040        bool SetValue(const Value& value);
00041        void ResetValue();
00042 
00043        // reimplemented (iser::IProperty)
00044        virtual const iser::IObject* GetDefaultPropertyPtr() const;
00045 
00046        // reimplemented (iser::IObject)
00047        virtual QByteArray GetFactoryId() const;
00048 
00049        // reimplemented (iser::ISerializable)
00050        virtual bool Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive);
00051 
00052        // static methods
00053        static QByteArray GetTypeName();
00054 
00055 protected:
00056        iser::TCopySerializedWrap<Value> m_value;
00057 
00058        mutable istd::TDelPtr<PropertyType> m_defaultPropertyValuePtr;
00059 };

00064 template <typename Value>
00065 TObjectProperty<Value>::TObjectProperty()
00066        :BaseClass()

00071 template <typename Value>
00072 TObjectProperty<Value>::TObjectProperty(
00073                             IPropertiesManager* propertyOwnerPtr,
00074                             const QByteArray& propertyName,
00075                             const QByteArray& propertyDescription,
00076                             int propertyFlags,
00077                             int changeFlags,
00078                             const ValueType& defaultValue)
00079        :BaseClass(propertyOwnerPtr, propertyName, propertyDescription, propertyFlags, changeFlags)
00080 {
00081        m_defaultPropertyValuePtr.SetPtr(new PropertyType());
00082 
00083        m_defaultPropertyValuePtr->SetValue(defaultValue);
00084 
00085        SetValue(defaultValue);
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 template <typename Value>
00090 const Value& TObjectProperty<Value>::GetValue() const
00091 {
00092        return m_value;
00093 }
00094 
00095 
00096 template <typename Value>
00097 bool TObjectProperty<Value>::SetValue(const Value& value)
00098 {
00099        if (m_value != value){
00100               return m_value.CopyFrom(value);
00101        }
00102 
00103        return true;
00104 }
00105 
00106 
00107 template <typename Value>
00108 void  TObjectProperty<Value>::ResetValue()
00109 {
00110        if (m_defaultPropertyValuePtr.IsValid()){
00111               SetValue(m_defaultPropertyValuePtr->GetValue());
00112        }
00113 }
00114

00116 // reimplemented (iser::IProperty)

00118 template <typename Value>
00119 const iser::IObject* TObjectProperty<Value>::GetDefaultPropertyPtr() const
00120 {
00121        return m_defaultPropertyValuePtr.GetPtr();
00122 }

00134 // reimplemented (iser::ISerializable)
00135 
00136 template <typename Value>
00137 bool TObjectProperty<Value>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00138 {
00139        static iser::CArchiveTag valueTag("Value", "Property value");
00140 
00141        istd::CChangeNotifier notifier(archive.IsStoring()? NULL: this);
00142 
00143        bool retVal = true;
00144 
00145        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(valueTag);
00146        retVal = retVal && m_value.Serialize(archive);
00147        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(valueTag);
00148 
00149        return retVal;
00150 }
